product_name: Shimano Deore/Sun Disc MTB 29er Front Wheel
long_description: The Shimano Deore/Sun Rhyno Lite Disc MTB 29er front wheel boasts excellent value and performance for big-wheeled fun on the trails. 32-hole Sun Rhyno Lite rim uses triple-box design to maximize sturdiness; rim is Presta valve compatible. 14-gauge spokes are laced 3-cross onto hubs for excellent strength and durability. Double contact seals on Shimano Deore hub shut out water and dust. Hub is ISO 6-bolt disc-compatible; rim sidewalls are brushed for enhanced braking with rim brakes. Quick-release skewer included; 100mm front axle spacing. Please note: rim tape is not included with the Shimano Deore/Sun Rhyno Lite MTB 29er front wheel.
short_description: The Shimano Deore/Sun Rhyno Lite Disc MTB 29er front wheel boasts excellent value and performance for big-wheeled fun on the trails.
